snippet: MF Global's internal watchdogs defended their tumultuous tenures at the brokerage firm, telling Congress on Thursday that they sufficiently sounded the alarms about risky wagers on the European sovereign debt that toppled the firm.
abstract: MF Global's internal watchdogs defended their tumultuous tenures at the brokerage firm, telling Congress on Thursday that they sufficiently sounded the alarms about risky wagers on the European sovereign debt that toppled the firm.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- MF Global's internal watchdogs defended their tumultuous tenures at the brokerage firm, telling Congress on Thursday that they sufficiently sounded the alarms about risky wagers on the European sovereign debt that toppled the firm.

headline.main: MF Global's Former Risk Officers Defend Their Tenures
